divs: sighting detailsmy family and i were on vacation in tempe arizona and decided to go to sedona for the day. while at the catholic church built in the rock in sedona i saw a flash in the sky, a reflection from the sun. i grabbed my camera and started taking pictures. i was only able to get one shot. i waited until now because this was my third sighting and not until what i saw on august 10th at 10:14pm did i realize that we are seen more ufo���s now than ever. my first sighting was october 10, 1985 driving to dinner in tempe, az heading north on scottsdale blvd. and the radio dj breaks in and announces that academy award director, writer, actor, producer george orsen welles has died at the age 70. no more than 2-5 minutes later the same dj breaks in the middle of a song and starts talking about 3 lights over north phoenix, in the perfect shape of a triangle. a red light on top, yellow\orange light on the right and a blueish green light on the left. as my girlfriend at the time, (now my wife of 21 years and at my side for every sighting) and i drove up scottsdale rd we saw the lights. trying to keep the car straight and looking up at the same time (i don���t recommend this to anyone who sees a ufo, pull over and look) there it is, hundreds of people calling it in the radio station, police station, and the airport, then a few minutes later, its gone. the top light goes straight up and the two bottom lights go opposite directions, one to the east and the other to the west. simultaneously the lights disappear, so fast that you could not see anything or follow any of them.
